title: Mapping Roomba
description: A Roomba robot that can map and navigate rooms.
fullDescription: This project was part of my ELEC 442 robotics course at UBC. With a group, we used a Raspberry Pi, iRobot Create 2, STM32, and LiDAR sensor to map an unknown room and navigate between two points in the room. I focussed on the low level API used to control the Roomba's movements and sensor readouts, as well as the interface between the Raspbarry Pi and a local computer for remote control.
